description: Erection of part two, part single storey side extension, single storey side extension, part two, part single storey rear extension, rear roof dormer extension, installation of two side and two rear roof lights and installation of external insulation and matching brick slip cladding to the house.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications:  1142/10  Received:  18 May 2023;  Unreferenced Location Plan; Unreferenced Proposed Block Plan; Unreferenced Perspective Drawing; 1122/01; 1122/02; 1122/03; 1122/04; 1122/05; 1122/06; 1142/02 (Rev C); 1142/03 (Rev C); 1142/04 (Rev A); 1142/05 (Rev C); 1142/06 (Rev A); 1142/07 (Rev B); 1142/08; 1142/09; 1122/50 (Rev A); 1122/51 (Rev B); 1122/52 (Rev A)  Received:  10 May 2023.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extensions hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows, doors or other glazed openings shall be formed in the part two, part single storey side extension, single storey side extension, part two, part single storey rear extension and rear roof dormer extension hereby approved.
